title: Chinese used by the largest number of people

content.question: According to the report, which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: The event will not be held again for four years.
Guests are encouraged to preregister several months in advance.
Guests focus mainly on current global affairs at the event.
Chinese is the language used by the largest number of people in the world.

content.answer: Chinese is the language used by the largest number of people in the world.
